about_the_game:
"

Encounters in the Subterranean I


Encounters in the Subterranean I is a 5e module that consists of 10 unique encounters that can easily be dropped into an underground terrain. These encounters range from 1st - 13th Average Party Level (APL), involve a mix of exploration, combat, and social roleplaying, and have been specifically designed to utilize the included maps.


What's included?

  • 10 encounters: 4 Tier 1 encounters, 4 Tier 2 encounters, 2 Tier 3 encounters
  • 10 detailed encounter maps
  • 34 creature statblocks
  • 17 magic items
  • 4 lookup & random tables
  • Amazing art throughout
"
detailed_description:
"

Encounters in the Subterranean I


Encounters in the Subterranean I is a 5e module that consists of 10 unique encounters that can easily be dropped into an underground terrain. These encounters range from 1st - 13th Average Party Level (APL), involve a mix of exploration, combat, and social roleplaying, and have been specifically designed to utilize the included maps.


What's included?

  • 10 encounters: 4 Tier 1 encounters, 4 Tier 2 encounters, 2 Tier 3 encounters
  • 10 detailed encounter maps
  • 34 creature statblocks
  • 17 magic items
  • 4 lookup & random tables
  • Amazing art throughout
"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
